column2: Code source of Smart Table module: a table/grid for Angularjs

column5:
Merge pull request #811 from erandros/master

Add role and aria-sort attributes to stSort
Add role and aria-sort attributes to stSort

Changed default pagination-template to generate links that are more
ContentSecurityPolicy Header compliant

Merge pull request #791 from MrWook/patch-4

Handle Angular 1.6 error for stSort

Handle Angular 1.6 error for stSort

Adjustments to prevent that the $timeout.cancle() will throw an error in certain cases (More information in #780).
Hopefully the final PR for this adjustment and I'm sorry that i spammed the PR section with this.

Add links to issue references in changelog
Descriptions for recent issues to match others

Add [href] to anchor tag in pagination template

Merge pull request #615 from douglas-treadwell/fox_desending_first_default

stConfig option for desendingFirst default, with test
Adding test for stConfig descendingFirst option.
Adding sort descendingFirst default configuration option.

Adding st-descending-first option for st-sort so that when a column is
clicked it will sort descending first, then ascending, then natural.
fix(stSrot): digest in progress when st-sort-default is set

Merge pull request #556 from ginna-baker/master

Update readme.md date, update syntax

Merge pull request #545 from fedescarpa/issue-544-add-st-sort-array-support

Issue 544 add st sort array support
added support to stSort array value

Merge pull request #531 from huyph/add-option-to-remove-throttle

added option to remove throttle in stSort

Merge pull request #429 from jonespen/master

add commonjs support
add devDependencies to bower (needed for the build ...)

add commonjs support

same method as angular modules (ng aria example:
https://github.com/angular/bower-angular-aria/commit/ab0e79af9c2a80b746e
cd2bdb1fd9c330b254ee9)

Support nested object paths during search

Allow searching complex objects. We still use the filter service from
angular, but provide it a predicate object that matches the structure of
the complex object. The predicate object is being built by the $parse
service.

Merge pull request #409 from phuvo/master

fix(stConfig): use `skipNatural` correctly
Avoid creating isolated scope for st-search directive

Merge pull request #308 from Toilal/debug-friendly

Enhance build and bower packaging to make debugging more accessible
Enhance build and bower packaging to make debugging more accessible

Merge pull request #307 from Toilal/package-name

Set package name to angular-smart-table
add spec to make sure callback is only called on page change
Added st-page-change callback to st-pagination directive.

Tables with 1 row still render using st-safe-src

We encountered a problem in which tables wouldn't display if they just
had one row and we were using the st-safe-src attribute on the table.

This commit contains a test and a fix for the issue.
#276 - pagination - st-items-by-page should support string values

Return the result of a custom pipe from the public functions that call pipe()

- This allows imperative control of paging/sort/search from a
  directive to perform some action when the pipe is complete.

Closes #233

Ability to set custom template for pagination
Ability to set custom template for pagination

just use single wrapping immediate function
do not create extra module for pagination template

Added ability to customize sorting classes

When you have your own sorting classes stSort now enables to plug them in.
avoid undefined to appear in the text boxes
fix natural sort state + streamline strategy view to tablestate / tablestate to view
tests for pagination + hide on less than 2 pages

some wrong revert in the pagination

applying config settings after ctrl.clearColumns()

fix(bug when value not set in config)
feat (breaking) sort functions 1) ascent 2) descent 3)natural order

don't trigger ng-dblclick when isEditMode is true

don't trigger ng-dblclick when isEditMode is true

Fix

Merge pull request #80 from TNGPS/patch-1

allow for HTML formatted cell contents

allow for HTML formatted cell contents If you have complex objects or images and want to show then in a smartTable you can use a formatFunction, however the formatted HTML is shown as plain tekst i.s.o. the rendered HTML. Changing element.text to element.html allows you to see the rendered HTML. example: the cell data is a image URL and the formatFunction returns we can now see the images in the table.
Merge branch 'patch-2' of https://github.com/pheuter/Smart-Table into pheuter-patch-2
update to support filterFilter of 1.2.X angular branch
for the moment keep watching the length, see with release of Angular 1.2 (see issue 47 for more details)
fix(bug when value not set in config)
fix bug: item content is sync with table row

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/lorenzofox3/Smart-Table

Conflicts:
	Smart-Table.debug.js
	Smart-Table.min.js
	example-app/js/Smart-Table.debug.js
bug(pagination directive collision) thanks to https://github.com/popalexandruvasile

Support for IE 8:
  * Refactored smartTable and editableCell directives to broaden 'restrict' to 'A'
  * smartTable partial now provides <pagination> directive as an attribute on a div
changed test related scripts to refer to karma as opposed to testacular
changed pagination module and directive name to prevent conflict with angularui.bootstrap pagination module
feat(emit event on changPage, udateDataRow, selectionChange)
add an update dataRow to the table API, (preparing api events emitting)
use immediate function so that each file can be run in strict mode or not independently

Merge pull request #2 from ccapndave/interpolate-symbols

Interpolate symbols

Implemented --startSymbol and --endSymbol options to allow custom builds of SmartTable that use different angular interpolation symbols.
Example usage: grunt build --startSymbol="{[{" --endSymbol="}]}"
html2js requires the module name to be explicitly specified otherwise it defaults to 'templates-smartTable' (the code expects smartTable.templates)
do not apply reformat on min file
template for header, cleanup the directives
adapte test to simplified version of format filter
add the filter module into test coverage
use proper injection so that any column will have the default properties values. add the ability to override these values at configuration time
add sort, move directives to proper file
add array utility and move the selection mechanism to the table ctrl
first commit, ordering and display data

Merge pull request #52 from michaelneale/master

Added link to cloudbees clickstart

Update to node 0.8 : "sys" is now called "util".

Simple text and replace and it works on node 0.8.
Added global flag to path replace function in handleRequest to allow more than one space (aka %20) in the name
Update windows scripts to use Testacular
add junit reporter to testacular configs
pass arguments through test.sh and e2e-test.sh
switch over to using Testacular for running unit tests
switch over to using Testacular for E2E tests
add link to CDN to index.html
fix typo in sample e2e test
Fix extraneous " in doctype tag. Changed ng:autotest to ng-autotest
Fix broken references to widgets and make template IE friendly
add inlined ng:cloak definition to the async template
remove extra ng:app from async template
Fixed two small typos in scripts/web-server.js.

Update scripts for running tests

- change forward slash into back slash in Win scripts
- split params to new lines
- remove $tests option as it makes no sense now

Add jstd-scenario-adapter so we can run e2e tests with JsTD

Added basic configuration, so all you need to run e2e tests:
1/ start web server in project root
>> ./scripts/web-server.js

2/ start JsTD server
>> ./scripts/e2e-test-server.sh

3/ capture some browser
navigate to http://localhost:9877/capture

4/ run the tests
>> ./scripts/e2e-test.sh
making the windows script crlf delimited
Added windows .bat equivalents to .sh scripts for running tests
add index.html to the seed layout docs
fix typo in controllers.js placeholder code

removing display:none + ng:show from index.html the best practice is not to use angular markup in index.html so the hide/show thing is not needed. instead of
{{foo}}
use
in index.html. In other templates it is totally fine to use markup.
switching scripts/test.sh from sh to bash
upgrade to angular 0.9.10 and update the code with angular API changes
updated jasmine adapter to newer version
